job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Technical Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving AI tools for customer support, rather than developing or engineering AI models or systems from scratch. The core responsibilities involve analyzing tickets, providing feedback to AI, and integrating existing AI capabilities, which aligns more with a user or enhancer of AI tools rather than a builder or engineer of AI systems. The role is primarily customer-facing and support-oriented, lacking the deep technical development, modeling, or MLOps components typically found in ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer issues and how AI can be used to resolve them, aligning technical support with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions' and 'improving the AI system', which implies some level of interaction with or modification of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' suggests a direct involvement in enhancing the performance of AI models.
Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies falls under the umbrella of software development, specifically in exploring and integrating new technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: Reviewing AI-generated solutions and providing feedback is a form of monitoring and evaluation, which is a component of MLOps, albeit at a higher level.
job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
